data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

A Human Shaman, their body covered in stark, dark tattoos that shimmer with corrupted energy, stands on the scarred, obsidian slopes of the Obsidian Crag. With hands outstretched, they forcefully draw tendrils of shadowy, black mana from the cracked earth, their face grimacing in a display of dark power, under a bleak, star-dusted cosmic twilight.

Artist Credit: inspired by Raymond Swanland

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
